name: Buycraft
desc:
Set up automatic stores for your server.
&cMake sure to follow the Minecraft EULA!
&cYou can view it here:
&chttps://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula

name: Enjin
desc:
Connect an Enjin site and Donationcraft store to your server.
&cMake sure to follow the Minecraft EULA!
&cYou can view it here:
&chttps://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula

name: Old Combat
desc: Make combat like pre-1.9 Minecraft.

name: BetterCombat
desc:
Moves the combat style back to 1.7/1.8
Removes attack speed, adds block hitting, etc.

name: MC Realistic Plus
desc:
Completely overhauls the survival experience,
making a lot of things more realistic.
Adds things such as block gravity, broken bones, and temperature.

name: Seasons
desc: Bring the real world seasons into your server!

name: Nanobots
desc:
Adds programmable self-replicating nanobots.
They can be used to clear out blocks and more!

name: Quests
desc: A very extensive quest system.

name: Beauty Quests
desc: Make quests for your players to embark on with a simple GUI.

name: Essentials
desc:
Essential commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

name: Essentials Spawn
desc:
Setup a server spawn point.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

name: Essentials Chat
desc:
Format the chat to make it look nicer.
&cRequires &nVault&c.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

name: Essentials Kit Adder
desc:
Add kits with commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

name: Essentials Group Manager
desc:
Create permission systems.
&cRequires &nEssentials Chat&c for prefixes.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

name: Permissions Ex
desc:
Create permission systems.
&cRequires &nEssentials Chat&c for prefixes.

name: AquaticPerms
desc:
A super simple per-user permissions plugin.
Made by Minehut user &nDividedWeFall&r.

name: Jobs
desc: Let your players earn money by doing various jobs!

name: Banner Maker
desc: Create banners in a GUI

name: Easy Enchant
desc: Add enchantments to items in an easy GUI!

name: Report Menu
desc:
Allow players to report rule-breakers with
a nice inventory menu.

name: uReport
desc: GUI for reporting rule-breakers

name: Command Block Control
desc: Whitelist or blacklist command usage from command blocks.

name: Admin Menu
desc: An admin menu for managing online & offline players.

name: Skript
desc: Modify servers through a scripting interface.

name: Skript Addon: skQuery
desc: Adds a TON of new features to script.

name: Skript Addon: skRayFall
desc: Make inventory menus, quests, and more in skript.

name: Skript Addon: ExtrasSK
desc: Adds extra features to skript

name: Skript Addon: LargeSK
desc: Adds a few basic extras to skript

name: Skript Addon: MundoSK
desc:
Allows you some world editing features,
books and enchantments, and more with Skript.

name: Skript Addon: RandomSK
desc: Adds some animation and other features to skript.

name: Skript Addon: skDragon
desc:
Adds particle effects and dragon travel
features to skript.

name: Skript Addon: skRambled
desc:
Allows you to hook into other plugins
such as mcMMO and WorldGuard with skript.

name: Skript Addon: TuSKe
desc:
Allows some plugin hooks and some
other interesting features in skript.

name: Ultra Cosmetics
desc:
Fully-featured cosmetics plugin with everything
from hats and particles to pets and mounts!

name: PandaWire
desc: Increases the efficiency and performance of redstone

name: InstantRespawn
desc:
Stops the Respawn screen from showing
and respawns straight away.

name: No Cheat Plus
desc:
Anti-cheat system to block bad modifications.
&aProtocolLib is &a&nrecommended&r&a while using No Cheat Plus.

name: Phoenix Anti-Cheat
desc:
Anti-cheat to block client modifications.
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&c.

name: Hack Detective
desc:
Another anti-cheat to block harmful client mods.
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&c.

name: ProtocolLib
desc: API which allows plugins to access new functions.

name: uCars
desc:
Extremely versatile and well-made car plugin.
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&c.

name: RandomTP
desc:
Allows players to easily teleport to random locations in the world.
Made by Minehut user &niTurtleDerp&r.

name: ArmorStand Editor
desc: Easily edit armorstand poses and attributes in-game

name: World Edit
desc: Build tools.

name: Async WorldEdit
desc:
Makes large worldedit operations more performant
&cRequires &nAsync WorldEdit Injector&c and &nWorldEdit&c.

name: Async WorldEdit Injector
desc: Injects Async WorldEdit into WorldEdit

name: Houses
desc: Allow players to buy, sell, and rent houses

name: World Guard
desc: Create and manage regions using this plugin.

name: Red Protect
desc:
Anti-Grief, Chat protection, Spawn Protection
May be a good alternative to WorldGuard.

name: GriefPrevention
desc:
Anti-grief plugin which lets your players protect
their own builds. Can also be used to
make admin claims.

name: Voxel Sniper
desc: Long range map editing tool for terraforming.

name: Fast Async VoxelSniper
desc: Optimizes VoxelSniper.

name: goBrush
desc: A plugin with brushes and height maps for terraforming.

name: Bank Notes
desc:
Adds functionality for withdrawing money into physical items.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

name: Vault
desc: Economy, Permissions, and Chat API.

name: Placeholder API
desc: API which gives plugins access to variables to display.

name: GitSchematic
desc:
Import and share WorldEdit schematics
&cRequires &nWorldEdit&c.

name: CreeperHeal
desc: Automatically heal explosion damage!

name: Minigames
desc:
Allows you to create custom minigames of all different types!
&cRequires &nMinigames Regions&c.

name: Minigames Regions
desc: Library for the Minigames plugin to create regions for maps.

name: Duels
desc:
A full duel system for players to
fight in 1v1s which is very customizable
from in-game!

name: GunGame
desc:
A gamemode where you earn upgrades to gear
by getting kills!

name: Bed Wars
desc: The complete Bed Wars experience in one plugin

name: Sky Wars
desc: An automated, fully-featured Sky Wars plugin

name: Murder
desc: Garry's Mod gamemode, Murder, put into Minecraft!

name: Trouble in Terrorist Town (TTT)
desc: Garry's Mod gamemode, TTT, put into Minecraft!

name: Friday the 13th
desc:
A fun minigame where one player plays as Jason
and the rest have to run and hide!

name: Color Cube
desc: A territorial-based minigame.

name: Replica
desc: A minigame where players compete to replicate a picture.

name: MinigamesLib
desc: Library that supports multiple minigame plugins.

name: DeathRun
desc:
Garry's mod gamemode, DeathRun, ported to Minecraft!
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: One in the Chamber
desc:
A fast-paced minigame where bows are one-hit kill.
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Bow Bash
desc:
This is a TDM gamemode where you must avoid
the enemy's arrows and explosives and try to kill them all.
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Conquer
desc:
A team gamemode where the teams compete to
capture checkpoints in the map.
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Sea Battle
desc:
Try to hit your enemies with snowballs in boats!
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Flying Cars
desc:
Fly in planes and try to shoot your enemies down!
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Snake
desc:
The classic game of Snake in Minecraft!
Eat food to grow, but don't run into someone's snake!
&cRequires &nMinigamesLib&c.

name: Combat Log
desc: Punish players who log out during combat!

name: Shop Chest
desc: A new plugin for players to sell items from chests

name: ChestShop
desc: Chestshops that allow players to sell/buy items.

name: Crack Shot
desc: Guns in Minecraft.

name: Crates Plus
desc: Crates to give out rewards to players with keys.

name: Shopkeepers
desc: Create customizable villager shops with this plugin.

name: Silk Spawners
desc: Create and pick up custom mob spawners.

name: Orebfuscator
desc:
Counter X-Ray, resource packs, chest radars
and other similar exploits.
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&c.

name: Chat Control
desc: Control aspects of the chat and prevent swearing/spamming.

name: NoodleChat
desc:
Block specific words from being used in chat.
Made by Minehut user &nPerfectNoodles&r.

name: Lockette
desc: Personal chest protection system.

name: EZRanksPro
desc:
Simple auto rankup plugin.
&cRequires Vault and a permissions plugin.
&cScoreboards will reset when installed.

name: MineResetLite
desc: Create mines that will reset.

name: Libs Disguises
desc:
Disguise as mobs!
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&c.

name: Create Your Own Menus
desc:
Allows you to create your own GUI menus!
&cNote: May be vulnerable to exploits within hack clients.
&cUse &nItem Fixer &cwith this!

name: Item Fixer
desc: Blocks hack client features that abuse item nbt data

name: Project Korra
desc: Bring the elemental powers of Avatar: the Last Airbender into your server.

name: EchoPet
desc: EchoPet is no longer supported for 1.9+. It will not work!

name: SimplePets
desc:
A simple pets plugin (EchoPets replacement)
&cRequires &nSimpleAPI&c.
&c&nThis may conflict with Citizens!

name: SimpleAPI
desc: A simple, lightweight set of APIs

name: Auctions
desc:
An elegant auctioning solution that
allows text tooltips for auctioned items
&cRequires &nVault&c.

name: ObsidianAuctions
desc:
Unique chat based auction system.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

name: Trade+
desc:
Lets players easily and safely trade items via a GUI.
Made by Minehut user &nGamer&r.

name: Action Announcer
desc: Create timed broadcasts for your server through the action bar.

name: Actionbar
desc: Animated actionbar, join messages, etc.

name: UltraBar
desc: Send Boss Bar messages, Titles, and Actionbars!

name: Holographic Displays
desc: Make floating messages around your world.

name: SuperTrails
desc: Colorful cosmetic trails to get around fabulously.

name: CustomEnchants
desc: Custom enchantments and levels!

name: Citizens
desc:
Create custom and interactive NPCs.
&cCan cause extreme lag. Lots of free RAM is required!

name: CommandNPC
desc:
Add right-clickable commands to your NPCs.
&cRequires &nCitizens&c.

name: McMMO
desc: RPG experience in Minecraft!

name: Massive Factions
desc:
An alternative factions plugin by MassiveCraft
&cRequired &nMassive Core

name: Massive Core
desc: Core plugin required for Massive Factions

name: Factions
desc: Claim land, build a base and wage war!

name: Obsidian Breaker
desc:
Allows explosions to break Obsidian!
&aWorks well with Factions raiding.

name: ASkyBlock
desc:
Survive on Skyblock islands.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

name: Acid Island
desc: Survive on an island where water is acid!

name: ASkyGrid
desc:
Survive in a grid of blocks.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

name: Towny
desc: Towny is a versatile, player-controlled land management plugin.

name: TownyChat
desc: This is required if you want to let Towny modify chat.

name: VoidWorld
desc: Create void-worlds with this and Multiverse-Core.

name: PlotSquared
desc: PlotSquared is a land management plugin.

name: Core Protect
desc: Fast, efficient block logging and anti-griefing tool.

name: Log
desc:
Log block changes in your world.
Made by Minehut user &nDividedWeFall&r.

name: Joe's Horse Collect
desc: Collect, transport, place and spawn horses.

name: Joe Marriage
desc: Added marriages and divorces to your server.

name: Marriage Master
desc: Allows you to marry other players with many special features

name: Loot Protect
desc:
Protects loot dropped upon death.
Made by Minehut user &nGamer&r.

name: ClearLag
desc: Helps clear the lag on your server.

name: Scaffold
desc:
A multi-world plugin developed by Minehut.
Allows importing worlds through commands!
This plugin is recommended over Multiverse-Core

name: Multiverse
desc: Multi-world management.

name: Multiverse Portals
desc: Multiverse addon for world portal creation

name: Multiverse Nether Portals
desc: Multiverse addon for teleportation between worlds using nether portals

name: Multiverse Sign Portals
desc: Multiverse addon for teleportation between worlds using signs

name: Multiverse Adventure
desc:
Multiverse addon for adventure map makers!
Resets worlds automatically between plays.

name: Punishment
desc:
Punish your players more effectively! 
&cNote: May prevent scoreboards from properly displaying.

name: Chest Cleaner
desc:
Sorts chests and inventories to make them neat.
Can be done manually and/or on a timer.

name: AutoMessage
desc: A fully in-game edited automatic broadcast system.

name: Tablist
desc: Animated tablist with variables

name: Titlebar
desc: Animated titlebar

name: Title Welcome Message
desc: Add welcome messages via titles, tablist headers/footers, etc.

name: Nametag Edit
desc: Edit tablist/scoreboard prefixes and suffixes

name: Area Shop
desc: Allows for the buying and renting of worldguard regions

name: AutoColor
desc: Permission based auto chat color

name: ChatColor+
desc:
Allows your users with permissions
to change their name/chat color!

name: TrainCarts
desc:
Link minecarts, create stations and make railway systems!
&cWARNING: May use high amounts of RAM!
&cRequires &nBKCommonLib&c.

name: BKCommonLib
desc: Dependency for TrainCarts

name: ImageOnMap
desc: Create map boards with images.

name: PhatLoots
desc: Allows players to receive loot (money/items/exp/etc...) from Chests/Mobs.

name: NBTEditor
desc:
Allows easy customization of many aspects of Minecraft
through the modification of NBT tags.

name: RPGItems
desc: Add special lore, abilities, and more to items.

name: Itemizer
desc: Edit the display name, lore, and other item attributes.

name: Item Editor
desc: Modify attributes of items in a simple menu.

name: PlayerVaults
desc:
Allows players to use an unlimited (or set)
amount of personal storage vaults.

name: Slimefun
desc:
Adds 400+ custom items to the game and
enchances the game to modpack level.
&cRequires &nCS-CoreLib

name: ExoticGarden
desc:
Exotic Garden is a Slimefun Addon which 
generates new plants all over your world.
&cRequires &c&nSlimefun&c and &nCS-CoreLib

name: CS-CoreLib
desc: Library for Slimefun and Exotic Garden

name: MinePacks
desc: Adds backpacks for your players to store items in

name: Vein Miner
desc: Mine entire veins of ores with a simple break of a block

name: Herobrine
desc: Add Herobrine to your server!

name: Simple Drugs
desc: Adds items that give potion effects
